DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Constructed Space Maintainers Group Egyptian Children
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study - To determine Prevalence construct space maintainer Pediatric Dentistry Dental Public Health Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University . - To assess knowledge , attitude awareness construct space maintainer pediatric patient ' guardian Pediatric Dentistry Dental Public Health Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University . - To assess knowledge , attitude practice pediatric dentist towards use space maintainer child , Pediatric Dentistry Dental Public Health Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University . PO1 : Population : Egyptian child construct space maintainer guardian attend Pediatric Dentistry Dental Public Health Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University . Outcome1 : Prevalence construct space maintainer Knowledge , attitude awareness construct space maintainer pediatric patient ' guardian . PO2 Population2 : Pediatric dentist Pediatric Dentistry Dental Public Health Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University . Outcome2 : knowledge , attitude practice pediatric dentist towards use space maintainer .
DOC.criteria: two population 1st population Pediatric patient Inclusion criterion pediatric patient : 1 . All patient construct space maintainer 2 . Positive patient 's acceptance participation study . 3 . Both gender include . 4 . Children Medically free systemic disease . Exclusion criterion pediatric patient : 1 . Patients orthodontic appliance . 2 . Patient one different follow habit thumb sucking , lip biting , tongue thrust etc . 2nd population pediatric dentist : Inclusion criterion Pediatric dentist : All Pediatric dentist master degree . Exclusion criterion Pediatric dentist : Pediatric dentist refuse participate study .
